name: Raceaway
description:
Controls - Keyboard & Mouse

  • W - Accelerate
  • S - Brake/Reverse
  • A/D - Turn
  • Left Shift - Boost
  • M - Mute music

Controls - Gamepad

  • Right Trigger - Accelerate
  • Left Trigger - Brake/Reverse
  • Left Stick - Turn
  • Left Bumper - Boost
  • Select - Mute music
